GI_counts.name: number of grounded icebergs per grid cell

fbot.name: basal heat flux ice to ocean

fhocn.name: lateral heat flux ice to ocean

strairx.name: zonal magnitude of atmosphere stress on ice

strairy.name: meridional magnitude of atmosphere stress on ice

strair.name: magnitude of atmosphere stress on ice

strintx.name: zonal magnitude of internal ice stress

strinty.name: meridional magnitude of internal ice stress

uvel.name: eastward sea ice velocity on B-grid

vvel.name: northward sea ice velocity on B-grid

uvelE.name: eastward sea ice velocity on E-grid

vvelE.name: northward sea ice velocity on E-grid

uvelN.name: eastward sea ice velocity on N-grid

vvelN.name: northward sea ice velocity on N-grid

ispd_B.name: sea ice velocity magnitude (CICE native B-grid)

ispd_Ta.name: sea ice velocity magnitude (unweighted spatial average)

ispd_Tb.name: sea ice velocity magnitude (unweighted spatial average)

ispd_Tx.name: sea ice velocity magnitude (weighted spatial average)
